summary: UI Merge testing complete. All features working correctly: 4 Quick Actions (Find People, Send External, Pay Bills, Receive) visible on Home for BOTH Personal and Business profiles. Bills page at /sender/bills shows different default categories based on profile type. Receive modal shows active profile handle. Active Profile indicator in header with avatar + @handle + type badge. Profile Switcher dropdown works. Bottom navigation identical for all profiles.

home_quick_actions_tests.Personal profile - Receive button: PASS - data-testid='receive-btn' found, opens Receive modal
home_quick_actions_tests.Business profile - Same 4 Quick Actions: PASS - All 4 buttons visible and functional for Business profile

bills_page_tests.Personal profile categories: PASS - Shows Utilities, Mobile Load, Internet, Government, Credit Card, Insurance
bills_page_tests.Business profile categories: PASS - Shows Utilities, Rent/Lease, Internet, Payroll-related, Suppliers, Gov't/Taxes

active_profile_indicator_tests.Business profile - Avatar in header: PASS - Shows 'A' initial with purple background

bottom_navigation_tests.Personal profile - 6 tabs visible: PASS - Home, Send, People, Businesses, Activity, Settings
bottom_navigation_tests.Business profile - Same 6 tabs: PASS - Navigation identical after profile switch
bottom_navigation_tests.Mobile view - Personal profile: PASS - All 6 tabs visible in bottom nav

critical_code_review_comments: Home.jsx correctly implements 4 Quick Actions grid with data-testid attributes
Bills.jsx correctly shows different categories based on activeProfile.type
SenderShell.jsx header shows Active Profile indicator with avatar + @handle + type badge
ProfileSwitcher.jsx dropdown works correctly with 'Active Profile' and 'Switch to' sections
Bottom navigation in SenderShell.jsx is identical for all profiles (6 tabs)
Receive modal correctly shows active profile handle and BUSINESS badge for business profiles
seed_data_creation: Test profiles created via localStorage: personal_test_001 (John Doe/@johndoe), business_test_001 (Acme Corp/@acmecorp)
context_for_next_testing_agent: UI Merge fully tested. Key verifications: 1) Home page shows 4 Quick Actions (Find People, Send External, Pay Bills, Receive) for BOTH Personal and Business profiles. 2) Bills page at /sender/bills shows different default categories - Personal: Utilities, Mobile Load, Internet, Government, Credit Card, Insurance; Business: Utilities, Rent/Lease, Internet, Payroll-related, Suppliers, Gov't/Taxes. 3) Receive modal shows active profile handle (@johndoe or @acmecorp) with copy button. 4) Header shows Active Profile indicator (avatar + @handle + type badge). 5) Profile Switcher dropdown works. 6) Bottom navigation identical for all profiles (6 tabs: Home, Send, People, Businesses, Activity, Settings).
